subject: World Cup 2022 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: The president of the United States soccer federation, Sunil Gulati, denied a report that FIFA had asked it to form an organizing committee that could take over preparations for the 2022 World Cup if it is taken away from Qatar.
snippet: The president of the United States soccer federation, Sunil Gulati, denied a report that FIFA had asked it to form an organizing committee that could take over preparations for the 2022 World Cup if it is taken away from Qatar.
